verses.verse: And God<WH430> spoke<WH1696> all these words<WH1697>, saying<WH559>,
I am the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430>, which have brought<WH3318> you out of the land<WH776> of Egypt<WH4714>, out of the house<WH1004> of bondage<WH5650>.
You shall have no other<WH312> gods<WH430> before me<WH6440>.

You shall not make<WH6213> unto you any engraved image<WH6459>, or any likeness<WH8544> of any thing that<WH834> is in heaven<WH8064> above<WH4605>, or that is in the earth<WH776> beneath<WH4325>, or that is in the water under the earth<WH776>:

You shall not bow down<WH7812> yourself to them<WH5647>, nor serve them<WH3068>: for I the Lord your God<WH430> am a jealous<WH7067> God<WH410>, visiting<WH6485> the iniquity<WH5771> of the fathers<WH1> upon the sons<WH1121> unto the third<WH8029> and fourth<WH7256> generation of them that hate me<WH8130>;
And showing<WH6213> mercy<WH2617> unto thousands<WH505> of them that love<WH157> me<WH8104>, and keep my commandments<WH4687>.

You shall not take<WH5375> the name<WH8034> of the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> in vain<WH7723>; for the Lord<WH3068> will not hold him guiltless<WH5352> that takes<WH5375> his name<WH8034> in vain<WH7723>.
Remember<WH2142> the sabbath<WH7676> day<WH3117>, to keep it holy<WH6942>.
Six<WH8337> days<WH3117> shall you labor<WH5647>, and do<WH6213> all your work<WH4399>:

But the seventh<WH7637> day<WH3117> is the sabbath<WH7676> of the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430>: in it you shall not do<WH6213> any work<WH4399>, you nor your son<WH1121>, nor your daughter<WH1323>, your manservant<WH5650>, nor your maidservant<WH519>, nor your cattle<WH929>, nor your stranger<WH1616> that is inside your gates<WH8179>:

For in six<WH8337> days<WH3117> the Lord<WH3068> made<WH6213> heaven<WH8064> and earth<WH776>, the sea<WH3220>, and all that in them is<WH5117>, and rested the seventh<WH7637> day<WH3117>: why the Lord<WH3068> blessed<WH1288> the sabbath<WH7676> day<WH3117>, and hallowed it<WH6942>.
Honor<WH3513> your father<WH1> and your mother<WH517>: that your days<WH3117> may be long<WH748> upon the land<WH127> which the Lord<WH3068> your God<WH430> gives you<WH5414>.
You shall not kill<WH7523>.
You shall not commit adultery<WH5003>.
You shall not steal<WH1589>.
You shall not speak<WH6030> false<WH8267> witness<WH5707> against your neighbor<WH7453>.

You shall not covet<WH2530> your neighbors<WH7453> house<WH1004>, you shall not covet<WH2530> your neighbors<WH7453> wife<WH802>, nor his manservant<WH5650>, nor his maidservant<WH519>, nor his ox<WH7794>, nor his donkey<WH2543>, nor any thing that is your neighbors<WH7453>.

And all the people<WH5971> saw<WH7200> the thunderings<WH6963>, and the lightnings<WH3940>, and the noise<WH6963> of the trumpet<WH7782>, and the mountain<WH2022> smoking<WH6226>: and when the people<WH5971> saw<WH7200> it<WH5128>, they wavered, and stood<WH5975> afar off<WH7350>.
And they said<WH559> unto Moses<WH4872>, Speak<WH1696> you with us<WH8085>, and we will hear: but let not God<WH430> speak<WH1696> with us<WH4191>, lest we die.

And Moses<WH4872> said<WH559> unto the people<WH5971>, Fear<WH3372> not<WH430>: for God is come<WH935> to<WH5668> prove<WH5254> you<WH3374>, and that his fear may be before your faces<WH6440>, that you sin not<WH2398>.
And the people<WH5971> stood<WH5975> afar off<WH7350>, and Moses<WH4872> drew near<WH5066> unto the thick darkness<WH6205> where God was<WH430>.
And the Lord<WH3068> said<WH559> unto Moses<WH4872>, Thus you shall say<WH559> unto the sons<WH1121> of Israel<WH3478>, you have seen<WH7200> that I have talked<WH1696> with you from heaven<WH8064>.
You shall not make<WH6213> with me gods<WH430> of silver<WH3701>, neither shall you make<WH6213> unto you gods<WH430> of gold<WH2091>.

A altar<WH4196> of earth<WH127> you shall make<WH6213> unto me<WH2076>, and shall sacrifice on it your burnt offerings<WH5930>, and your peace offerings<WH8002>, your sheep<WH6629>, and your oxen<WH1241>: in all places<WH4725> where I record<WH2142> my name<WH8034> I will come<WH935> unto you and I will bless you<WH1288>

And if you will make<WH6213> me a altar<WH4196> of stone<WH68>, you shall not build<WH1129> it of cut stone<WH1496>: for if you lift up<WH5130> your tool<WH2719> upon it<WH2490>, you have polluted it.
Neither shall you go up<WH5927> by steps<WH4609> unto my altar<WH4196>, that your nakedness<WH6172> be not discovered on it<WH1540>
